reviews.review_msg: I've taken 304 with him in the past, and he has the same general outline for all his classes. An individual project, a partner-project, a midterm, and a final. The lectures can drag on at times, but he does explain things very well. If you want easy marks, don't take classes with him, he makes you work for it. Make sure to read and go to class.

This was a Quantitative class, in French syntax.  I thought I knew grammar, but I didn't. Great course for future teachers like me.  This was the most challenging class i took in French, but I really learned a lot about French. He is funny too!
